Module TradingSimulator.project
Package Markets

Class Market<T extends Asset>

java.lang.Object
Markets.Market<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Asset that is traded on a market
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommodityMarket, CurrencyMarket, StockMarket
public abstract class Market<T extends Asset> extends Object
The abstract class representing a market.

      asset - The asset to be bought.
